resources.string: The easy-mode if you are a novis player
A little more difficult sudoku boards
The most challenging boards only for the pro gamers
Something is wrong with the red squares

This is a Sudoku game written as an assignment in IINI54001 at NTNU 
Roles: All the rows, columns and 3x3 squares needs to have alle numbers from 1 to 9. No row, columns or 3x3 square can have multiple of the same numbers. 
How to start: Press the start button, choose a difficulty a board, then press the start button. All squares that are colored dark gray must be filled in. After you have finished, press the check button. If everything is in order, you will be sent back to the tray selector. 
If something is wrong, you will be notified. If one of the squares turns red, it means that you have entered than illegally character or forgot to enter a value. If you are unsure of certain values, you can long-press on the given route and it will change color. To change the color back, press again. 
Add your own board: Press the "Add a board" button and you will get a completely empty board with the option to enter the numbers you want and set the name and degree of difficulty. Note that it is not possible to change or delete individual boards after they have been made, you must reset the game for the boards to disappear. This will delete all custom boards.
Do you relay want to delete all your cool boards?
